services.name: api
args: const http = require('http'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { if (req.url === '/health') { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/plain'}); res.end('ok'); } else { res.end('api'); } }); server.listen(4400, () => { console.log('API server listening on 4400'); }); setInterval(() => { console.log('API heartbeat'); }, 3000);
